2. Sock and Buskin - Retrigger all played face cards
3. Abstract Joker - +18 Mult (6 jokers × 3)
4. Acrobat - X3 Mult on final hand, +1 Joker slot, Negative edition
5. The Trio - X3 Mult for Three of a Kind
6. Hanging Chad - Retrigger first played card 2 additional times

**Shop Options:**
- Mail-In Rebate ($4) - Earn $5 for each discarded 4 (can't afford)
- Card Sharp ($6) - X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round (can't afford)
- Celestial Pack ($4) - Choose 1 of up to 3 Planet cards (can't afford)
- Magic Trick voucher ($10) - Playing cards can be purchased from shop (can't afford)
- Reroll cost: $5 (can't afford)

With only $3, I cannot afford any of the shop items or a reroll. The cheapest item is the Mail-In Rebate at $4, which I'm $1 short of.

I could sell a joker to get more money, but let me evaluate if any of them are worth selling:
- Zany Joker ($4) - Core to my Three of a Kind strategy with polychrome


- Sock and Buskin ($3) - Retriggers face cards, adding value
- Abstract Joker ($2) - Provides +18 mult from my joker count
- Acrobat ($5) - X3 mult on final hand and provides extra joker slot
- The Trio ($4) - X3 mult for Three of a Kind (core)
- Hanging Chad ($2) - Retriggers first card 2 additional times

I could sell Abstract Joker ($2) to reach $5, then buy Mail-In Rebate ($4), leaving me with $1. Alternatively, selling Sock and Buskin ($3) would give me $6 total, opening up more options.

Mail-In Rebate feels unreliable since it only generates $5 per discarded 4, making income inconsistent. Card Sharp is more compelling—it triggers X3 mult whenever I replay a hand type I've already used this round. Since I'm repeatedly playing Three of a Kind, this would stack significantly on my second and subsequent plays.

Comparing the trade: Sock and Buskin's face card retriggering is useful but peripheral to my strategy, whereas Card Sharp directly amplifies my core Three of a Kind plays with consistent multiplier scaling.

For the Ante 5 Boss with its steep chip requirements, that X3 mult multiplier becomes essential. My second Three of a Kind would triple its mult, and my third (when Acrobat triggers) would triple again. Looking at the actual damage: my base Three of a Kind hits 90 chips with 9 mult, Abstract Joker pushes it to 27 mult, Zany Joker with polychrome reaches 58.5 mult, The Trio triples it to 175.5 mult, and if it's my final hand with Acrobat, I'm at 526.5 mult. Adding Card Sharp's multiplier on top of this would be substantial.

The math is compelling—Card Sharp would push that final hand from 526.5 mult all the way to 1579.5 mult, nearly tripling my output. Sock and Buskin provides value, but it doesn't match the raw power of that X3 multiplier stacked on my repeated hands. I'm selling Sock and Buskin to fund Card Sharp.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
